title: Prairie
description: HIS STORY WAS THE STORY OF AMERICA...Charles Burton Irwin. An American legend. He was a leader of men and a lover of adventure. With his wife and children at his side, he grabbed hold of the reins of change and rode the wild American West into a new frontier - the twentieth century.From the wagon trains and cattle drives of the old West, to the birth of the railroads, he shaped America's destiny in the dawn of a new age.This long-awaited monumental saga from the bestselling author of SACAJAWEA was years in the writing. PRAIRIE. A vivid portrait of the spirit and passions of a bold new land - and the of the man who embodied its shining future.
author: Anna Lee Waldo
